data.message: Sorry, got to say one more thing after reading some of these ignorant comments- you who claim to be fans and are pissed at what was said have either NEVER really listened to M's words or he hit a nerve.But  you certainly shouldn't have been surprised.The man speaks truth to power...

replies.message:
I couldn't believe that @Eminem drew a line in the sand.
 I didn't realize I had to decide where to stand. 

  He doesn't want you as a fan, 
If you won't  surrender your opinion to the will of this uneducated man.

He places his hand held high in a fist,
 I get that he dont like whats going on and he's pissed.

If I like Trump, fuck me, I've got to go?
  Even though Ive followed you since The Eminem Show.

Well Im too old for rap now, but so are you
 So go back to being obsolete,  and  Fuck You too!
